sen.j: 中村 歌右衛門（なかむら うたえもん）は歌舞伎役者の名跡。
sen.e: Utaemon NAKAMURA was a professional name of a kabuki actor.
Utaemon NAKAMURA is a Kabuki (traditional drama performed by male actors) actor's professional name.
Utaemon NAKAMURA is a Kabuki (traditional drama performed by male actors) actor's professional name.

sen.j: もとは上方役者だったが、三代目が江戸に下った。
sen.e: He was originally a Kamigata actor, but Utaemon NAKAMURA the third went down to Edo.
He was originally an actor in Kamigata (Kyoto and Osaka area), but the third went down to Edo.
He was originally an actor in Kamigata (Kyoto and Osaka area), but the third went down to Edo.

sen.j: 四代目までは立役として、五代目以降は女形として活躍。
sen.e: Utaemon NAKAMURA the first to the fourth were tachiyaku (leading male-role actors) and Utaemon NAKAMURA the fifth and later were actors of female roles.
Up to the fourth, Utaemon NAKAMURA was active as tachiyaku (leading male-role actors) and the fifth and later was as onnagata (actor of female roles).
Up to the fourth, Utaemon NAKAMURA was active as tachiyaku (leading male-role actors) and the fifth and later was as onnagata (actor of female roles).

sen.j: 成駒屋系統のもっとも権威ある名跡で、現在ある名跡のうち中村勘三郎系と中村富十郎系を除くすべての中村姓の名跡は歌右衛門の子孫または門弟から発する。
sen.e: It was a most authoritative professional name in the Narikomaya lineage, and all the professional names of the Nakamura families, except the Kanzaburo NAKAMURA and Tomijuro NAKAMURA lineages, originated from descendents or disciples of Utaemon.
